product_name: Swix HF6BW High-Fluoro Glide Wax - 14 to 23 Degrees F - 40g
long_description: Ideal for normal winter conditions below freezing, this easy-application wax with lubricant excels on alpine slopes, cross-country trails and artificial snow conditions from 14 to 23F.
short_description: Ideal for normal winter conditions below freezing, this easy-application wax with lubricant excels on alpine slopes, cross-country trails and artificial snow conditions from 14 to 23F.
